sentences.en: I'd rather have seen him gnash his teeth than smile so.
sentences.cn: 我宁可看他咬牙也不愿看这样的笑。

sentences.en: In a moment the pirate be all around us rolling their eyes gnash their teeth and filing their nail.
sentences.cn: 马上，海盗们瞪起眼睛，咬牙切齿，摩拳擦掌，把我们团团围住了。

sentences.en: It makes me gnash my teeth to see so much food deliberately destroyed or wasted when there are people starving in Africa.
sentences.cn: 当非洲人民在 挨饿时，我看到这么多故意毁坏和浪费的食物，真 使我气得咬牙切齿。

sentences.en: Judge the gnash teeth in hatred ground say: Judge your 20 years imprisonment specific term!
sentences.cn: 法官咬牙切齿地说: 判你二十年有期徒刑!

sentences.en: Many things happened, each want to a regret, anxiety, depression, gnash the teeth in anger, if not so good.
sentences.cn: 很多事情发生后，每想一次后悔一次，焦虑、压抑、咬牙切齿，如果当时不那样就好了。

sentences.en: The wicked plot against the righteous and gnash their teeth at them;
sentences.cn: 恶人设谋害义人，又向他咬牙。

sentences.en: There has been much gnash of teeth over the new legislation.
sentences.cn: 不少人对新法规感到愤愤不平.

sentences.en: Your gnash one's teeth says: Upstairs corridor falls!
sentences.cn: 你咬牙说: 楼上过道摔下来的!

trans.tran_en: to be very angry or unhappy about something, or to move your teeth against each other so that they make a noise, especially because you are unhappy or angry

trans.tran_cn: （牙）磨咬，上下叩击，（尤指因没有得偿所愿而）咬牙切齿，非常愤怒（或沮丧）
